hideTemporaryDescription: This will hide the project. CodexFlow will remember hidden projects. You can enable "Show hidden projects" to view and unhide it.
hideTemporaryDescriptionNamed: CodexFlow will hide "{name}" and remember hidden projects. Enable "Show hidden projects" to view and unhide it.
hiddenProjectBlocked: This project is hidden. Enable "Show hidden projects" to make it visible again.
externalConsoleBlockedDesc: Unable to launch the external {env} console. Check your environment configuration and try again.
externalConsoleBlockedHint: Use the terminal mode switcher in the top bar if you need to change environments.
selectProjectLeft: Select a project on the left
createOneToStart: Or open a project to get started
